akn:section.akn:heading: Use of weapons of mass destruction

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Offense Against a National of the United States or Within the United States.—

akn:content.akn:p: (a) A person who, without lawful authority, uses, threatens, or attempts or conspires to use, a weapon of mass destruction— shall be imprisoned for any term of years or for life, and if death results, shall be punished by death or imprisoned for any term of years or for life.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Offense by National of the United States Outside of the United States.—

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Any national of the United States who, without lawful authority, uses, or threatens, attempts, or conspires to use, a weapon of mass destruction outside of the United States shall be imprisoned for any term of years or for life, and if death results, shall be punished by death, or by imprisonment for any term of years or for life.
